summary: This document is a chain of emails from November 2020 between FBI personnel and attorney Gloria Allred's office, discussing logistical arrangements for Epstein victims (clients of Allred) to attend a meeting in Miami with the Department of Justice. The emails focus on travel arrangements, the possibility of remote participation via secure telephone due to the pandemic, and coordination for a client's boyfriend to attend for support.

persons.name: Gloria Allred
persons.context: High-profile attorney communicating with the FBI about arranging for her clients (Epstein victims) to attend a DOJ meeting in Miami, seeking remote participation options.

persons.name: Diane Aldrich
persons.context: Primary point of contact for the FBI, coordinating travel and attendance details for Allred's clients for the Miami meeting.

connections.description: Diane Aldrich is the Executive Assistant to attorney Gloria Allred, handling communications and logistics for Allred's law firm.
Allred is in direct communication with FBI personnel regarding the coordination of her clients' participation in a DOJ victim meeting.

events.title: FBI informs Allred of DOJ coordination
events.description: An FBI agent informs Gloria Allred that the DOJ is talking to the Miami office to explore secure options for victims unable to travel, promising more answers.

events.title: Client requests to attend Miami meeting with boyfriend
events.description: Diane Aldrich communicates that a client wishes to attend the Miami meeting and would like her boyfriend to join for support, initiating travel arrangements.

events.title: FBI inquiry on client travel willingness
events.description: An FBI agent asks another to determine how many of Allred's clients are unwilling to travel and their locations, to assess what U.S. Attorney's Office (USAO) resources would be needed.

keyFacts: The Department of Justice was organizing a meeting in Miami for Epstein victims in late October/early November 2020.
Attorney Gloria Allred represented multiple clients who were Epstein victims invited to this meeting.
Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, Allred's office sought secure telephone line options for clients unable to travel to Miami.
At least one client wished to bring a boyfriend for emotional support to the meeting.
FBI personnel were actively involved in coordinating logistics and communication between the victims' counsel and the DOJ.
